snippet: The Royal Society in Great Britain, the world’s oldest continuous scientific society, is striving to stay relevant in the modern world.
abstract: The Royal Society in Great Britain, the world’s oldest continuous scientific society, enjoys a storied past, but is striving to stay relevant in the modern world; some of the Society's publications remain cutting-edge, but it faces stiff competition from the United States and other nations where billions in funding are up for grabs.
lead_paragraph: The Royal Society in Great Britain, the world’s oldest continuous scientific society, is striving to stay relevant in the modern world.

headline.seo: Royal Society Holds Firm Amid Political Challenges to Science
headline.main: A Redoubt of Learning Holds Firm
headline.print_headline: A Redoubt of Learning Holds Firm
